content.en: Algorithmic trauma evaluation: Researchers have investigated the use of algorithms in evaluating and managing blunt abdominal trauma. They found that algorithms incorporating focused abdominal sonography for trauma (FAST) can help select patients who would benefit from a CT scan and safely defer the scan for others. Sonography-based algorithms were found to be more rapid, less expensive, and as accurate as other diagnostic methods. These findings suggest that algorithms can improve the efficiency and accuracy of diagnosing and managing abdominal trauma.
content.da: Algoritmisk traumeevaluering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer i vurdering og håndtering af stump abdominalt traume. De fandt, at algoritmer, der integrerer fokuseret abdominal sonografi til traume (FAST), kan hjælpe med at udvælge patienter, der vil have gavn af en CT-scanning og trygt udsætte scanningen for andre. Sonografibaserede algoritmer viste sig at være hurtigere, billigere og lige så præcise som andre diagnostiske metoder. Disse fund tyder på, at algoritmer kan forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af diagnosticering og håndtering af abdominalt traume.
